attributes.action: Not to change ‘sex’ to ‘biological sex’ rather than ‘gender’ in The Equality Act
attributes.additional_details: Trans people make up a tiny % of the UK population, yet they have been used as propaganda and as a scapegoat to whip up fear and hate for political gain. The Independent reports that Transphobic hate crimes have increased by 56% in a year because of negative governmental and social discourse. Excluding them from The Equality Act will see these hate crimes soar as Trans folks are denied access to ‘single sex spaces’ & are denied legal standing in their gender - in direct contradiction of the GRA.
attributes.background: To commit to not making the reported changes to The Equality Act, changing ‘sex’ to ‘sex assigned at birth’/‘biological sex’ rather than being inclusive of ‘gender’ and ‘gender identity’. To make these changes further marginalises Trans people and opens them up to physical violence.
